item.title: How much does suspended sediment corrode the turbine?
item.description: Suspended Sediment Concentration and Turbine Performance of Hydropower Projects In this independent consulting job for the World Bank, I collected suspended sediment and turbine performance data for hydropower projects in Nepal and India.
